items.content_html: This repository hosts a lightweight web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to harness the power of the GitHub API. The application enables users to effortlessly explore GitHub user profiles, search for repositories, and access detailed user information.

The application enables users to effortlessly explore GitHub user profiles, search for repositories, and access detailed user information.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
